entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 14 except 8 over eastern sections.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High 14 except 8 over eastern sections. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
